references.paper_title: You only look once: Unified, real-time object detection
references.reason: This paper introduces the YOLO object detection model, a key component in many object detection pipelines that heavily rely on NMS.
This paper introduces Fast R-CNN, another influential object detection model that uses NMS and helped advance the field.

references.paper_title: Histograms of oriented gradients for human detection
references.reason: This foundational paper introduced HOG features, widely used in object detection and impacting the design of many NMS algorithms.

references.paper_title: Microsoft coco: Common objects in context
references.reason: The MS COCO dataset, introduced in this paper, is a large-scale object detection benchmark that heavily influences NMS research.
This paper introduces YOLACT, a real-time instance segmentation method that is closely related to object detection and utilizes NMS.
